CodeBlockMethod.Code: -- 건물 체력 관련 모델인 BuildingHpBarBackground 모델에서 사용하는 컴포넌트 -- BuildingHpBarForeground, BuildingHpBarText 생성

CodeBlockMethod.Name: OnBeginPlay
CodeBlockMethod.Code:
local Entity = self.Entity local ParentEntity = Entity.Parent
local ParentBoxOffset = ParentEntity.HitComponent.BoxOffset local ParentBoxSize = ParentEntity.HitComponent.BoxSize local ParentScale = ParentEntity.TransformComponent.Scale
Entity.TransformComponent:Translate(0, (ParentBoxOffset.y - ParentBoxSize.y/2 - 0.15)/ParentScale.y) Entity.TransformComponent.Scale = Vector3.one / ParentScale.x
local HpBarForegroundModelID = "model://9f757d76-34e3-45e8-8402-6aa5c542f125" local HpBarTextModelID = "model://2d93572b-10b4-491b-885f-71e52c3d5eb8"
wait(0.1)
_SpawnService:SpawnByModelId(HpBarForegroundModelID, "BuildingHpBarForeground", Vector3.zero, Entity, nil) _SpawnService:SpawnByModelId(HpBarTextModelID, "BuildingHpBarText", Vector3.zero, Entity, nil)
